[klsdawgg plz post damage.]

Angel Prime




he saw Tavatron [sorry about the spelling.] be shot at so he flew over and 
pushed her out of the way so the shots would hit him. The shot hit his right 
arm tearing away most of the armor. his systems started to repair it. He 
made his Giant energy ball and threw it at Sun Crusher.
